metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20309 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in ImageMagick in versions before 7.0.11 and before 6.9.12, where a division by zero in WaveImage() of MagickCore/visual-effects.c may trigger undefined behavior via a crafted image file submitted to an application using ImageMagick. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20309` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
libmagick++-6.q16-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
libmagickcore-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
libmagickcore-6.q16-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
libmagickwand-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
perlmagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12
No subscription required

notes.Note: rayveldkamp> imagemagick is in universe from focal onwards

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.12').
